name: Luria

skills.name: Cursed Sword
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff OR a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff OR a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK] RB Heal Reduction BF Decrease SPD
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Mark of Fear
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. Enemies killed by this skill cannot be revived.
Damage based on: [ATK] 8Â° Block Revive
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Hex
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Removes all buffs. Also has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
